definition: a grammatical number category referring to two items or units as opposed to one item (singular) or more than two items (plural)
details:
adjective
- a grammatical number category referring to two items or units as opposed to one item (singular) or more than two items (plural)
= example: a grammatical number category referring to two items or units as opposed to one item (singular) or more than two items (plural)
- consisting of or involving two parts or components usually in pairs
= synonyms: double
- having more than one decidedly dissimilar aspects or qualities
= example: having more than one decidedly dissimilar aspects or qualities
= synonyms: double
